ValidationRule.description: If the Pricing Method is Cost Plus Markup Percent, the Cost Plus Markup Percent field is required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IsPickVal(Pricing_Method__c , "Cost Plus Markup Percent") && IsNull( Cost_Plus_Markup_Percent__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must provide a value for the "Cost Plus Markup Percent" field since you have set the Pricing Method to "Cost Plus Markup Percent"
